exposes.description: Remaining battery in %, can take up to 24 hours before reported.

options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the pressure value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: pressure_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for pressure, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: pressure_precision

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for humidity, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: humidity_precision

options.description: Calibrates the humidity value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: humidity_calibration

exposes.description: Remaining battery in %, can take up to 24 hours before reported.
exposes.name: battery

exposes.description: Indicates if the contact is closed (= true) or open (= false)
exposes.name: contact

exposes.description: Temperature of the device
exposes.name: device_temperature

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

exposes.name: power_outage_count

exposes.name: linkquality

options.description: Calibrates the device_temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: device_temperature_calibration

exposes.description: Measured temperature value
exposes.name: temperature

exposes.description: Indicates whether the device detected occupancy
exposes.name: occupancy

exposes.description: Remaining battery in %, can take up to 24 hours before reported.
exposes.name: battery

exposes.description: Measured illuminance in lux
exposes.name: illuminance_lux

exposes.description: Raw measured illuminance
exposes.name: illuminance

exposes.description: Blink green LED on motion detection
exposes.name: led_indication

exposes.description: Link quality (signal strength)
exposes.name: linkquality

options.description: Sends a message after the last time no occupancy (occupancy: false) was detected. When setting this for example to [10, 60] a `{"no_occupancy_since": 10}` will be send after 10 seconds and a `{"no_occupancy_since": 60}` after 60 seconds.
options.name: no_occupancy_since

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_calibration

options.description: Calibrates the illuminance value (percentual offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: illuminance_calibration

options.description: Calibrates the illuminance_lux value (percentual offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: illuminance_lux_calibration

definition.description: Zigbee USB Mini LED Controller RGB+CCT

features.description: Color temperature after cold power on of this light
features.name: color_temp_startup

presets.description: Restore previous color_temp on cold power on
presets.name: previous

features.description: Color of this light in the CIE 1931 color space (x/y)
features.name: color_xy

features.description: Color of this light expressed as hue/saturation
features.name: color_hs

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.name: effect

exposes.description: Link quality (signal strength)
exposes.name: linkquality

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.name: transition

options.description: When enabled colors will be synced, e.g. if the light supports both color x/y and color temperature a conversion from color x/y to color temperature will be done when setting the x/y color (default true).
options.name: color_sync

options.description: State actions will also be published as 'action' when true (default false).
options.name: state_action

exposes.description: Remaining battery in %, can take up to 24 hours before reported.
exposes.name: battery

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

exposes.description: Triggered action (e.g. a button click)
exposes.name: action

exposes.description: Operation mode, select "command" to enable bindings (wake up the device before changing modes!)
exposes.name: operation_mode

exposes.description: Link quality (signal strength)
exposes.name: linkquality

exposes.description: Remaining battery in %, can take up to 24 hours before reported.
exposes.name: battery

features.description: Current temperature measured on the device
features.name: local_temperature

features.description: Offset to be used in the local_temperature
features.name: local_temperature_calibration

features.description: Position of the valve (= demanded heat) where 0% is fully closed and 100% is fully open
features.name: pi_heating_demand

exposes.description: Select between direct control of the valve via the `valve_position` or automatic control of the valve based on the `current_heating_setpoint`. For manual control set the value to 1, for automatic control set the value to 2 (the default). When switched to manual mode the display shows a value from 0 (valve closed) to 100 (valve fully open) and the buttons on the device are disabled.
exposes.name: trv_mode

exposes.description: Directly control the radiator valve when `trv_mode` is set to 1. The values range from 0 (valve closed) to 255 (valve fully open)
exposes.name: valve_position

exposes.description: Link quality (signal strength)
exposes.name: linkquality

options.description: Controls the temperature unit of the thermostat (default celsius).
options.name: thermostat_unit

options.description: Set to false to disable the legacy integration (highly recommended), will change structure of the published payload (default true).
options.name: legacy

exposes.description: Remaining battery in %, can take up to 24 hours before reported.
exposes.name: battery

features.name: local_temperature

features.description: Offset to be used in the local_temperature

exposes.description: Select between direct control of the valve via the `valve_position` or automatic control of the valve based on the `current_heating_setpoint`. For manual control set the value to 1, for automatic control set the value to 2 (the default). When switched to manual mode the display shows a value from 0 (valve closed) to 100 (valve fully open) and the buttons on the device are disabled.
exposes.name: trv_mode

exposes.name: valve_position

exposes.description: Link quality (signal strength)
